message_type.title: Message type
message_type.description: Can be either `Transactional` or `Promotional` depending on the purpose of the message. Be aware that as per [documentation](https://help.bulkgate.com/docs/en/difference-promotional-transactional-sms.html#transactional-sms) **it is *strictly prohibited* to exploit transactional SMS for promotional/marketing uses. It must be used for notification purposes only - as an SMS notification.**

viber.title: Send to Viber?
viber.description: If `true` message will be send to `viber` primarly and fallback to `SMS` if the provided phone number does not have `viber` account. If `false` message will be send only via `SMS`

viber_sender.title: Viber sender
viber_sender.description: Sender name which will be shown in `viber` as the sender of a message (this field is mandatory if `Send to Viber?` is `true`
